conference_talks.venue: AMS Special Session on SoTL: Connecting Generative AI and Scholarly Inquiry to Improve Teaching and Learning
conference_talks.description: Understanding students' conversations can provide insights into their learning processes, but we lack reliable methodologies to extract useful learning information from them at scale. This presentation explores the innovative use of LLMs and other text-as-data methods for analyzing large-scale conversational datasets from online mathematics learning communities.
